name: playbook
author: z1p
description: Playbook style configuration management and automation. Enables controls over what has been targeted, completed, error's and reties of flows. Playbook enables you to quickly modify flows and track where it has been applied. Advanced functionality includes chaining playbooks one after another.

fields.label: inComplete
fields.description: When True incomplete playbooks will also be returned for the given playbookName and sequence number.

fields.label: excludeIncrementSequence
fields.description: When True any playbook occurrences that have a higher completed sequence will be excluded from the results.

event.resultData.description: Occurrence data defined when a playbook was ended.

playbookStart.description: Used to start a playbook for a provided playbook occurrence UID string.

fields.label: playbookName
fields.description: The name for this playbook.

fields.label: occurrence
fields.description: Occurrence string used to define a UID for playbook attempts. i.e. %%data[event][hostname]%%

fields.label: version
fields.description: Version number for the playbook.

fields.label: alwaysRun
fields.description: When True a playbook will always run even if it has been completed or the attempt numbers have exceeded. Delay between attempts is still honored.

fields.label: maxAttempts
fields.description: Number of times to try a playbook for a given occurrence UID before giving up.

fields.label: keepHistory
fields.description: When True history is outputted to the audit log when state changes for a given UID.

fields.label: delayBetweenAttempts
fields.description: Number in seconds to wait between attempts per occurrence UID.

fields.label: sequence
fields.description: This playbooks flows sequence number, used when multiple flows are used for a playbook one after another. Defaults to 0

result.description: Returns True if the action completed successfully.

rc.description: Returns the exit code for the action.

201.description: New playbook started for the provided UID.

300.description: Wait time between attempts has not been met.

304.description: No work to do for this UID.

403.description: Previous sequence not completed yet. Make sure that at-least sequence n-1 has been completed.

404.description: No previous sequence attempted, make sure a playbook with sequence 0 first.
